website_summaries.verdict: A quality blade that works well in the kitchen, but beware of receiving a damaged knife.
pros: Made of German steel with a full tang
Features a very sharp blade with hand polished edge.Black pakkawood handle is triple-riveted with a comfortable grip
cons: Some buyers received cleavers that had nicks or dings in the blade

customer_reviews.title: it’s good, but the handle :-(
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice balanced feel to it. The tang and handle are solidly built. This is the best cleaver in my arsenal. Good for chopping vegetables, it’s small enough to trim meat, yet heavy enough to be a cleaver. It’s the most versatile tool I have bought for the kitchen as far as dicing, slicing, etc. The bad is the handles are too small for the tang so the edges stick out and are sharp and catch things. That is a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Conlee

customer_reviews.title: Very unsatisfied with this product owned it for 3 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Very unsatisfied with this product owned it for 3 months chopped pork and cheken.the blade is bent. I can't believe it as advertised 55 Rockwell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a game-changer for raw vegetable preparation!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to make my own meals from scratch because of allergies and sensitivities to processed and fast-foods. I've seen so many people on the cooking channels that I watch on YouTube using cleavers to slice vegetables, so I decided to try one to find out if it was easier to use. I wish that I had bought one of these a lot earlier. My 'acid-test' was thin-slicing and 'match-sticking' carrots. I almost cried at how much easier it is with this, not just because of it's sharpness, but also because of the balance and curve of the blade.
customer_reviews.author: savagecoffee

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleaver, but may opt for a Ravenger next time.
customer_reviews.text: In retrospect I would have bought Dalstrong's Ravenger model over this one. There is absolutely nothing wrong with this cleaver. It is pretty and functional. The only reason I would recommend a Ravenger is that, not being practiced with a cleaver, I find that I have caused divots in our cutting board by rocking it too much when slicing. The Ravenger has a rounded end that would make it a cross between a cleaver and a santoku. That being said, it was a good purchase and a fine knife.
customer_reviews.author: Sharry

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaver, but need some improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Is a great cleaver, but I am disappointed about the craftsmanship of the handle, all metal in handle is not even with the wood, so a nice knife like this, a defect like that is just disappointed. You can feel the rivets that they did not polish enough and the end of the handle same problem you feel all this parts. A bit heavy but I am ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Escamilla

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STAR CLEAVER IN MINI SIZE
customer_reviews.text: I tend to use a single cleaver for all of my Asian inspired cooking and when it was time to setup my new apartment I choose the Dalstrong mini cleaver. I give this five stars for easy grip and size compared to standard cleaver but performs just as well or better. FIVE STARS
customer_reviews.author: DONALD C. HAN

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality. Great cleaver
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my mom who’s an avid cook. As soon as I took it out of the box she fell in love with it. The knife is amazing. She has been using it so far to cut filets and chicken and the blade has been very sharp, no problem at all cutting through anything. Totally five stars, looks like I’ll be purchasing another one for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: Nazzari

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy this years ago?
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how easy it is to cut onions with this. And acorn squash--which is the main reason I bought it. It comes nicely boxed with a pin (neither of which matter to me, but would be nice touches for gift giving). It also comes in a sheath, which I really wanted for safety's sake and to protect the cleaver as well. I'm very, very happy with this cleaver.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Best mini cleaver I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Gladiator 4.5” mini cleaver. It’s everything I hoped for plus much, much more. It fits in your hand perfectly and is razor sharp. I use it everyday and has become an important part of food prep in our house. The questionnaire asked about gift ability. Well, I already bought a second one as a gift for my son and daughter-in-law. They also love it and use all the time. She said it’s great to finally have a sharp knife back in her kitchen. I would recommend this product to anyone. The craftsmanship is top of the line bar none, plus it was very affordable. Thank you for making such a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B.

customer_reviews.title: I have just started acquiring good quality knives
customer_reviews.text: I have just started acquiring good quality knives. As I just received the Dalstrong Cleaver, I can say that it fits my hand perfectly. I have only cut a few things and so far it does an excellent job. I look forward to using it on many other task. Based on my limited experience with the cleaver, I still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cedric R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Excellent craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a little time to use this cleaver and I have to say that I reallyy enjoy using it. I have a fairly good sized hand, and the handle fits it very comfortably. This cleaver has a little heft, but don't let that fool you. With its very sharp and finely honed edge, it does a great job of thin and fine slicing as well as the bigger jobs. I find myself reaching for this blade for jobs that I previously used another knife or my older cleaver. Excellent product and craftsmanship. A delight to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan McCance

customer_reviews.title: The best damn cleaver money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleaver! It's amazingly sharp and well built. It feels like a dream in the hand and every chef should own this. Check out my unboxing on youtube to see it in action. Just search for JPM Dalstrong and you'll find all my Dalstrong unboxings. This cleaver is a steal at this price and continues to impress me.
customer_reviews.author: JPM.Cuisine

customer_reviews.title: Great knife at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: The first thing you notice when the knife arrives is the packaging. I bought the knife at the request of my housekeeper/cook. She swooned when the she began opening the box. I almost gave her the knife! I certainly is beautiful. My cook is a real artist. The knife is sharp and longer than the one it replaces. Easy to use, and efficient. I am so happy with it that I bought the 7" filet knife, too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bonin

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and the beast
customer_reviews.text: The cleaver is bigger than you would expect. The packaging is the usual above and beyond that Dalstrong does with every knife. This knife says it can be used on boneless meat but as a precaution I've only used it on vegetables. This beast chops through any vegetable I throw at it like butter, the hardest part is remembering to slow down and not lose a finger. The overall feel is nice, it's heavy, mine weighed in at a little over a pound. The sleek German look is simple, beautiful yet elegant. Next I need to purchase the cleaver Dalstrong makes for meat.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Rinier

customer_reviews.title: Edge ruined first time with only medium use
customer_reviews.text: I am not a metallurgist but I am a knife-guy so I understand what good steel is and what bad is. This product uses bad steel or at least uses a very bad heat treat process. This cleaver is easily the worst edged item I've ever purchased. It looks great and is well advertised, but this was a big disappointment in terms of performance.
customer_reviews.author: In Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great first cleaver for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Only used for couple weeks so far very happy with the knife. First cleaver type knife that I have used. Very sharp will have to see how the edge holds though. I have big hands and the knife fits great, it does have a long handle but is fine for me. Only issue are some.slight fit and finish, the edges on the handle dont line up between the handle and steel and a couple of the rivets so it's a little rough but doesnt bother me when using
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product by Dalstrong  !
customer_reviews.text: This lightweight mini cleaver packs all the powerful features as the big ones. Thanks to Dalstrong's superb design while made of top quality through out . What I purchased is far more than I paid for and certainly will come back for more Dalstrong products . Strongly recommended !!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Tsao

customer_reviews.title: Dalstrong has the best knives ive ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Love all dalstrong products! I have purchased this along with a kiritsuke and one of the black series chef knives. You really cant go wrong with the craftsmanship, sharpness, and overall balance of a dalstrong. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: I rehoned it with my water stone) cutting meats and veggies is very good.
customer_reviews.text: The edge did not hold up to cutting through chicken bones as I had hoped it would, though I was doubtful as it IS stainless steel. Beyond that, the balance, grip, aesthetic, and ability to hold an edge (yes, I rehoned it with my water stone) cutting meats and veggies is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Banks

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Weight is perfect for chopping through tough bone if needed or thin slicing through onion. This knife will replace all other knives once you try it. It's become my "go to" knife to get the job done. The quality of the handle is well made and I've had it for quite some time. I will definitely buy another product from this seller. Love my cleaver!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Best knives ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This clever is the best! I just fabricated chickens today at work with Dalstrong clever and it got the job done. I highly recommend their knives.
customer_reviews.author: dominique

customer_reviews.title: I have broken the blades of 2 other brand large ...
customer_reviews.text: I have broken the blades of 2 other brand large type knives cutting some items such as my dog’s rawhides. The Dalstrong clever gets the job done with one attempt. I will be venturing into splitting some chicken quarters later today and I have the utmost confidence it will perform without any issues. I thought it was very reasonably priced and it feels strong and balanced when handling it. I see myself buying additional Dalstrong knives very soon !!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Belusko

customer_reviews.title: very sharp..
customer_reviews.text: The knives is a little heavy but does the job perfectly. It is very sharp so be careful when you use it. I love the fact that it comes with a cover so is protected the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Nice mini cleaver
customer_reviews.text: Its the right size. I was concerned about getting one too large and this one fits the bill. Good material and nice to look at.
customer_reviews.author: JLH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little cleaver
customer_reviews.text: This mini cleaver almost does it all when it comes to most prepping jobs. Also has enough "heft" to do some decent big cleaver work, and holds sharpness really good.
customer_reviews.author: Deadstar

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and easy to use. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like the sharpness and easy to use function of this cleaver. It is the first one in my kitchen and I love it. I only use it twice to chop garlic and cut beef but I love it so much. At first I thought I will be too big for my hand to handle but I was wrong. The feeling of slicing the beef is like slicing tofu. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dieupj

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Cleavers are usually pretty utilitarian looking. This one looks and is made like a fine instrument. Beautiful workmanship, like their steak knives. The heft is good and it feels really good in the hand. Be careful though, it comes very sharp. It also comes in a beautiful presentation case.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and he absolutely loves it. Holds an edge well and easily sharpens when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Miles

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great mini cleaver , very sharp , very well made. I'm happy. 😀
customer_reviews.author: mark b

customer_reviews.title: Mini Cleavage
customer_reviews.text: Incredible for the price. I have several Dalstrong knives, they're a pleasure to use. This one is a real Honey. So handy, yet very Capable of large tasks. My other favorite is their Skiner. One of the best Values out there.
customer_reviews.author: Walt M.

customer_reviews.title: I'm liking it.
customer_reviews.text: If you're used to a French chef knife, keep on using a French chef knife. If you have definite knife skills, this type of knife is a real help. Great control, maintains sharpness(provided you "steel" it at appropriate times), and you are able to use it as a transporter to pick up your chopped/sliced items to deliver to the bowl/ pan/pot... it's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: A “must have” kitchen tool....
customer_reviews.text: Feels great in my hand! I do a lot of the cooking at home & this mini cleaver is now one of my favorite kitchen knives I reach for.
customer_reviews.author: E-man

customer_reviews.title: Superb Tool for the Kitchen or on the Go.
customer_reviews.text: The weight and feel in the hand is just phenomenal. It couldn’t be better and is superb for chopping and slicing.
customer_reviews.author: Lamar Britt

customer_reviews.title: I love it when products turn out to be better than ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it when products turn out to be better than expected. I’ve had a set of Henckle cutlery for some time now, sans cleaver, so I chose the Dalsrong Gladiator Seris cleaver for my collection. Good balance, excellent craftsmanship and it holds an edge quite well. I expect to get years of use from this fine piece of workmanship. I highly recommend this product as one which gives you the most bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: dogwood

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool, exceptionally priced!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a Sushi chef and decided to puchase the cleaver as a gift to her boss. The beauty and craftmanship are excellent with the Dalstrong line. I rated this purchase as an overall 4. It would be a 5 if it was not for a slight imperfection on the blade's edge at the tip.
customer_reviews.author: Sauron

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaver/knife
customer_reviews.text: I'm a prep chef at a counrty club and do events when this CORONA thing gets over I'm going to be so busy I need a knife/cleaver that can handle my pace this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Crushed box
customer_reviews.text: The knife is in perfect condition itself. But the box came with a crushed corner. Since this is my first set of professional knives, I'm keeping all the boxes for storage until I get a knife roll. Having the bent corner makes it difficult to get the interior box in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Domn8R

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the handle. The hold handle has a sharp edge and all three rivets stick out not flash to the handle leave sharp edge.
customer_reviews.author: mao pon

customer_reviews.title: Love to cut.
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife. Very sharp. Love the feel. Cuts like butter. I have also a chef knife of the same brand and I love that the same. Great knife. Like the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Coach

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cleaver
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. High quality, sharp blade, and the handle is very nice. This mini cleaver has a good solid weight to it. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: John Xcel

customer_reviews.title: A very effective cleaver
customer_reviews.text: I Got this for someone and they absolutely love it. It's very versatile , does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This knife came very sharp and ready for use. I has excellent balance. I love the sheath that they supplied.
customer_reviews.author: Cel Durant

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Why didn't I buy this YEARS ago?!
customer_reviews.text: Every kitchen should have this. There are certain times when a knife just doesn't cut it. You NEED a quality cleaver, and I recommend this one. Very high quality and a steal at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Lee T.

customer_reviews.title: last clever you'll ever need!
customer_reviews.text: man, what a great looking, well made clever! nice weight and the angle of the handle keeps it from twisting when hacking through some thick slabs of meat! $49 is a steal
customer_reviews.author: Jefffrey Joe Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blade
customer_reviews.text: Its like doing surgery I love this blade still have not had to sharpen after over 3 months of regular use
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: I Am very happy with my cleaver
customer_reviews.text: I Am very happy with my cleaver. It holds an edge very good and is easy to sharpen. It's weight is sufficient enough that pounding is not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Woodward

customer_reviews.title: A very well made tool. A must have for any kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! How did I live without one? As a widower and a wood worker, who is now his own chef, it is a joy to work with such a fine tool. I just sent one to my daughter and daughter-in law. Both are fine cooks. Let's see how they like using it.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: The knife was delivered on time and as shown on Amazon site. Very sharp knife with a good handle make easy work for delicate cutting to chopping through chicken bones. The sheath is an added bonus for great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Used this last weekend for chopped brisket, and it worked great. Fit and finish on these are superb. Highly recommend this brander cutlery needs.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this. What a beautiful and quality piece of work .
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a well-made product I have not used it yet but I have other products made by this company and they are all high qualityk
customer_reviews.author: greg eneix

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic cleaver, with top quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic cleaver, with top quality. I used to cut pork belly for making famous Chinese dish called HongShaoRou. Cutting the pork belly using this cleaver is like cutting tofu. Amazing! highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Wei Sun

customer_reviews.title: One of the greatest knives ever
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best amazon purchase ever. Bought the cleaver for a request at work. Was only planning on using it once, turns out it's more versatile than I thought. When your chopping up a couple pounds of parsley, this knife shreds though it like crazy and your hands will thank you. The quality is really outstanding for what I was expecting. Going to order a dalstrong chefs knife shogun series next.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy7716

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaver
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and functioning cleaver, added this to my 18 pc set. All thier knives are great quality and fantastic value and they have great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: idk

customer_reviews.title: hatchet
customer_reviews.text: added to husb. collection - loves it - very solid, sharp feeling - weight distribution good
customer_reviews.author: Wilma

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful knife, cuts with ease, I love this knife and will be purchasing more of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S. Vido

customer_reviews.title: Be Aware
customer_reviews.text: Be aware!!! This is made in PRC ( China ) Product .
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: I love this knife
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife! It’s the first clever I’ve owned and I was concerned that it would be a single use knife. However, I found myself using it for almost everything. The weight and balance is perfect. Very well constructed. I love this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: such a badass knife
customer_reviews.text: this is my 4th dalstrong gladiator knife. And like others, this one is so lovely. Great grip, quite heavy weight(which is I was looking for), and etc. Good for cutting anything. Not recommand for those who don't want heavy knife. again, THIS IS QUITE HEAVY
customer_reviews.author: S.H.Han

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cleaver
customer_reviews.text: Just recently purchased it. It seems sturdy and a quality product. I will update if my opinion changes.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Dalstrong purchase and as always GREAT. Very nice great quality knives for a great price. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W.

customer_reviews.title: Entirely pleased. Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Entirely pleased. Excellent value. Best knife I've ever owned. This Dalstrong Cleaver would make an excellent gift to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert A. Perkins, PhD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Excellent professional blade. It's so nice I almost don't want to use them. I purchased a set of J A Henkels about five years ago and I thought that they would be a great set of knives being they're German steel... and expensive... but yeah they suck. The craftsmanship Dalstrong puts into these knives speak for there self these knives are true professional tools I Love Them!
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaver for veggies!!
customer_reviews.text: love this ..it looks great and is weighted so you can really hammer down on tough veggies and even chicken bones for processing.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality beyond compare. Anyone should be delighted to receive this item. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my cleaver and I’ve never used one before. I’m never going back to small knives this always get the job done with little to no effort and time. It’s not heavy and easy to maneuver it took me no time at all to use confidently
customer_reviews.author: Ana.Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaver
customer_reviews.text: It's a great knife for heavy duty stuff like cutting chicken bones and hard vegetables. I still like my santoku for slicing and dicing things like onions.
customer_reviews.author: Sudhakar Rajender

customer_reviews.title: Best knife this former chef has ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This knife has to be one of the best I've ever used. Strong, sharp, has a great feel in the hand. I would recommend this to anyone wanting a well crafted knife.
customer_reviews.author: Renea Collier

customer_reviews.title: Beyond sharp, excellent balance
customer_reviews.text: Cleaver is beyond sharp, cutting pork shoulder or vegetables like they’re not even there. Will know how it holds an edge in a couple months. So far, great tool
customer_reviews.author: KK Dude

customer_reviews.title: Both knives are beautifully designed and crafted
customer_reviews.text: I got this and the 9.5 inch chef's knife. Both knives are beautifully designed and crafted ....the attention to detail and the pride the in the product is very evident. I have several wustoff knives, which feel like 2nd grade products compared to these knives.
customer_reviews.author: hsj0713

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this my son for Christmas, I’m am sure he will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda J. Green

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiancée for Christmas and I am so excited to his face when he opens it. He loves to cook and this is exactly what he has been looking for! It's a beautiful piece - I know we will be purchasing more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excelent presentation for a gift.  High quality product
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Even do is very small, its weight and robustness allows to use for hard work
customer_reviews.author: Patricio M.

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!  Love this knife.
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing knife. Ordered it for my husband and he was impressed. He wants more!
customer_reviews.author: chlorocks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect chopping cleaver for fowl & modest pork bones! a beautiful addition to my shogun set! w/custom sheath
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Surprising quality delivered
customer_reviews.text: After mastering the opening of the unique box I was impressed with the presentation of a beautiful cleaver! I was looking for a "utility" cleaver that would be comfortable while prepping vegetables or poultry and beef. I hit the jackpot. Ready for any task right out of the box! I will be back for more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small in size. Huge in performance.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be put off by the size. You could cut brush with this blade. Cuts through anything.
customer_reviews.author: Wskonsky

customer_reviews.title: be careful, it is really  sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on sale. great for $30, worth every penny spend on it. sharp and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Jin Liu

customer_reviews.title: It has worked great for me so farI
customer_reviews.text: I feel like a dangerous maniac with my shiny new cleaver. Love it! Works great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Summers

customer_reviews.title: Happy Chief Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cleaver for my husband the chief, it came in a very smart packaging and delivered promptly. My husband has been looking for the right cleaver for a while and he has past experience working in his uncles restaurants so I wanted to do well, Christmas will tell!!!
customer_reviews.author: ALorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Needed sharpening right out of the box. For the money I expected it to be ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Gross

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Very well-balanced, comfortable to use. The packaging was a bit of a struggle (there's a box intended to slide out from a cardboard sleeve; mine refused to slide and had to be cut off), but that was no more than a momentary annoyance. Beautiful product.
customer_reviews.author: Creighton J. Miller, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This is a super razor sharp meat cutter
customer_reviews.text: I own over 25 dalstrong knives. This is a super razor sharp meat cutter! If it says dalstrong, then you k ow it's quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley H

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife, not very versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Very beautifully package and a very handsome cleaver. But it does not have the versatility I expected from a cleaver. It was very sharp and very easy to handle, However, I cut through a small snapper about 9 inches long with small bones and it dented the sharp edge. I can't imagine it cutting through poultry bones. I think it is sharp enough for meat and easy to handle because it is well balanced but I need something more versatile. Not worth the price tag. I'm returning mine for a more heavy duty cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed broke in one week
customer_reviews.text: Looks fancy but poor quality The knife broke after use a few times by cutting chicken wings.
customer_reviews.author: Yougen Ye

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I received this product as described. Having been shopping for a cleaver for some time, I was impressed when it arrived. The packaging was impressive, all the included care information, and the product itself was great. I can’t say enough good things about the knife and it’s sharpness.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality. I was so sad returning this because ...
customer_reviews.text: Superior quality. I was so sad returning this because it was just too heavy for my intended daily use. Highly recommended though.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Extremely weak knife
customer_reviews.text: Broke first on the first wack on carne asada!! Blade is extremely weak. Terrible craftsmanship for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David Dale

customer_reviews.title: Cleaver looks great. Real nice weight to it
customer_reviews.text: Cleaver looks great. Real nice weight to it. My only feedback and suggestion, the cleaver comes pretty dull. After reading other feedbacks and complaints about chipping, I think the problem will be eliminated with a real good wet stone sharpening before using.
customer_reviews.author: Swendsen

customer_reviews.title: I love this cleaver
customer_reviews.text: As a line cook, I love this cleaver. Very durable, balanced and has a significant weight to it. However, it is very needy and one has to be taken care of after each use. Susceptible to smudges and oily prints. For obsessive chef will be a good task.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Katykhin

customer_reviews.title: Fav knife now
customer_reviews.text: Awesome knife, high quality just as promised. My favorite knife now
customer_reviews.author: Vito

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Solid, handles great, super sharp (through bones) - use extra care when operating.

customer_reviews.title: Another Amazing Dalstrong knife
customer_reviews.text: Another amazing Dalstrong knife - very happy with the entire Dalstrong Gladiator series.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Oldring

customer_reviews.title: Great Dalstrong Cleaver
customer_reviews.text: An excellently sharp and well balanced cleaver that's well priced. My only complaint is where the wood handle meets the tang is not quite flush leaving a slight edge along the handle. Very minor detail and could just be mine but was worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: nice cleaver
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, very sharp. does nice work with little effort
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaver. A great quality product that makes cutting and chopping easy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott V.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality - great gift for the chef in the family!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it so much! He feels like David Chang when he uses it!
customer_reviews.author: Alsweens15

customer_reviews.title: My best knife/cleaver
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, easy to handle, nice weight, sharp as hell with a long lasting edge. Very satisfied. My go-to knife/cleaver for almost everything.
customer_reviews.author: H. S. Gersten

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price! The cleaver is very well balanced for my hand. I use it daily, & it has replaced most of my knives. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri P. Doehrman

customer_reviews.title: Large and heavy, if you can handle that it's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavy, excellent for veg. Small irregularities around the handle rivets, but that would not stop me from buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Moore

product_meta.title: DALSTRONG Cleaver Knife - 7" - Gladiator Series - Forged ThyssenKrupp German HC Steel - Sheath
feature_bullets: Versatile multi-purpose cleaver featuring outstanding craftsmanship, cutting-edge technology, stunning design elements, and premium materials. Peak performance has never looked so good at this price.
Incredibly razor sharp cleaver, full-tang, imported high-carbon German steel with a hand polished edge at 14-16 degrees per side.

Award winning design, with satisfying heft, premium materials and quality feel. Luxury imported black pakkawood handle is triple-riveted with a grip that ensures comfort and maneuverability. Laminated and polished for a sanitary build, perfect for busy kitchens

Engineered to perfection at 56+ Rockwell hardness and hand polished to a satin finish. Carefully tapered for improved hardness, flexibility, and minimal slicing resistance. Tall blade height provides useful knuckle clearance.

Take Pride in your Knives: See why thousands of professional chefs and home cooks love and trust the DALSTRONG DIFFERENCE. 100% SATISFACTION OR MONEY BACK GUARANTEE, try it risk free, we know you'll love it!
